ðŸ“– Summary: Leantime is an open-source project management system designed for non-project managers. It combines strategy, planning, and execution with a focus on ease of use, incorporating features like Kanban boards, Gantt charts, and goal tracking. It aims to be a simpler alternative to tools like Jira and ClickUp.
